price: Shumë kohë më parë, Ne dërguam Nuhun te popullit i tij. (Ai u tha): “Unë jam për ju paralajmërues i hapët;
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
